title: Professional Summary
description: I am a software developer with 2 years of experience in a remote work environment. I have been programming since high school and am currently completing my final year of Informatics Engineering (Computer Science). In terms of my skills, I have worked with technologies such as Spring in combination with Thymeleaf, Hibernate, and Angular. Additionally, I have experience in utilizing Datatables with Javascript.

jobs.description: In my most recent role, I undertook a significant project involving a complete UI overhaul of the MyCareReports application, which is owned by the Cancer Support Community. I implemented various changes in user authentication, report generation, and addressed bugs, all while prioritizing the preservation of sensitive user data.
